åŸç†å°±åƒåˆšåˆšè¯´çš„ï¼Œå› ä¸º iframe ä¼šè§¦å‘æ–‡æ¡£çš„åŠ è½½ï¼Œäºæ˜¯ä¼šè§¦å‘ pageload ä»è€Œæ›´æ–° native çš„æ ‡é¢˜ã€‚ä»£ç ç±»ä¼¼è¿™æ ·ï¼š

function changeTitle(title) {
    document.title = title;
    let i = document.createElement('iframe');
    i.style.display = 'none';
    i.src = 'xxx'; // åŠ è½½å½“å‰é¡µé¢ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä½“ç§¯å°çš„èµ„æºï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚favicon.ico
    i.onload = ()=>{
        setTimeout(()=>{
            i.remove()
        }, 0);
    }
    document.body.appendChild(i);
}

å‰è€…æœ‰ç‚¹è¿‡ï¼Œå°±ä¸ºæ ‡é¢˜æ›´æ–°å•ç‹¬æ·»åŠ é€šä¿¡ï¼Œå¾’å¢å¤æ‚åº¦ã€‚åè€…æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒç§‘å­¦çš„æ–¹å¼ã€‚å…·ä½“å®æ–½ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

Swift

webView.addObserver(self, forKeyPath: #keyPath(WKWebView.title), options: .new, context: nil)

override func observeValue(forKeyPath keyPath: String?, of object: Any?, change: [NSKeyValueChangeKey : Any]?, context: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?) {
    if keyPath == "title" {
        if let title = webView.title {
            print(title)
        }
    }
}

Objective-C ç‰ˆæœ¬

[self.webView addObserver:self
                 forKeyPath:@"title"
                    options:NSKeyValueObservingOptionNew
                    context:NULL];

- (void)observeValueForKeyPath:(NSString *)keyPath
                      ofObject:(id)object
                        change:(NSDictionary *)change
                       context:(void *)context {
  if ([keyPath isEqualToString:@"title"]) {
    if (self.reactTitleChange) {
      self.navigationItem.title = self.webView.title;
    }
  }
}

å¦å¤–ï¼Œåˆ«å¿˜äº†é¡µé¢é”€æ¯æ—¶æ¸…ç†æ‰è¯¥ç›‘å¬ã€‚

[_webView removeObserver:self forKeyPath:@"title"];
